name: derivation
definition: A method for creating results by deriving them from other results.

name: estimation
definition: A method for creating results by estimation or professional judgement.

name: field_activity
definition: A method for performing an activity in the field at or on a sampling feature.

name: simulation
definition: A method for creating results by running a simulation model.

name: sample_analysis
definition: A method for ex situ analysis of a sample using an instrument, typically in a laboratory, for the purpose of measuring properties of a sample.

name: sensor_recording
definition: A method for creating results by automatic sensor measurements.

name: forecast  A type of simulation to predict the future. NA
